references.paper_title: An image is worth one word: Personalizing text-to-image generation using textual inversion
references.reason: This paper introduces the Textual Inversion method, a core technique that the current paper builds upon and analyzes.

references.paper_title: DreamBooth: Fine tuning text-to-image diffusion models for subject-driven generation
references.reason: This paper introduces the DreamBooth method, another core technique that the current paper improves upon.
This foundational paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), the underlying technology for text-to-image generation used in this work.
This paper significantly improves upon DDPMs, impacting the field of text-to-image generation, and is directly relevant to the current research.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This work introduces high-resolution image synthesis using latent diffusion models, directly relevant to the quality and scale of the results in the current paper.
